title: iropro 2m x 50m Heavy Duty Weed Control Membrane Garden Weed Barrier Fabric for Landscaping Driveway Gravel Artificial Grass Lawn Underlay Black Woven Roll Ground Cover
features: [A Variety of Sizes are Available to Suit Your Everyday Gardening Needs] We offer 10 sizes of weed membrane for you to choose from to meet your different usage needs. [PLEASE NOTE]: Please check the size you need before you choose, the 3 witdths of 2m/3m/4m weed cloths are folded and then rolled up when they are packed, please unroll the product completely after opening the package.

[Keeping Water and Nutrients to Keep Plants Healthy] iropro enduring weed control membrane is made of black woven high density polypropylene fabric, which has excellent air and water permeability to retain moisture and nutrients of the soil and keep plants healthy, but still can prevent weeds growing to the greatest extent.
[UV Resistant Weed Control Fabric] Our UV resistant weed barrier fabric won’t degrade when frequently exposure to strong sunlight, extremely suitable for hot and dry climate in high temperature area.

[Weed Membrane Heavy Duty with Guiding Threads to Keep Your Garden Tidy] This weed control fabric printed with guide lines is useful when you need to cut lines or holes while growing plants or vegetables in rows, bright green color makes it easy to see if you are laying it straight.

[Multi-purpose Heavy-duty Weed Control Fabric] Use heavy duty weed suppressant membrane for garden or landscaping, under raised bed, mulch, gravel path, walkway, driveway, decking, stone chipping, pebbles, artificial grass lawn, patio to suppress and control weed growth.
description: Product Description Spring Season It can raise the soil temperature; Increases tree nutrient storage; Prevents breeding activities of pests and reduces the incidence of orchard pests and diseases. Summer Season Minimise the growth of weeds around the plant and ensures that water and mineral nutrients are absorbed from the soil and supplied to the plant, thus ensuring its growth. Autumn Season It can raise the soil temperature; Increases tree nutrient storage; Prevents breeding activities of pests and reduces the incidence of orchard pests and diseases. Winter Season It can make it difficult for cold winds to intrude and reduce water loss through evaporation; Reducing the thickness of the permafrost layer increases the ground temperature and reduces and prevents root damage. There are two types of geotextiles for weed control: The weed fleece (A) is often used in gardening and landscaping or agriculture. It has a significantly lower water permeability. The advantage is a slower penetration of the water into the soil, but conversely this means a slower escape (evaporation) of the water out of the soil. After laying the weed fleece, we recommend that you first thoroughly water it to improve the water permeability. You will find after repeated rain and watering that the water permeability will settle. It is important to consider other factors, for example the soil type, the degree of 'preloading' with weeds, or how the fleece is 'embedded', the material you work with e.g. gravel. If the ground below is too dense, then the water will also slow down. With weed/ribbon tissue (B), water seepage is significantly faster, but with less water storage. Therefore, the fabric (B) is used rather as an additional weed barrier under opaque gravel paths, gravel paths or wooden decks. Please note Please note: Weed membranes in widths of 2m\3m\4m are folded and rolled up. Different Sizes Available to Meet Your Gardening Needs Our goal is to make your gardening experience easier and more convenient, so we offer different sizes of weed cloths to meet your daily needs.
